segments.text: I find it amusing how the girl holds her hand up, as if summoning a cookie from the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eager stance is so childlike and innocent; it's hard not to smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s danger lurking in their playful mischief, and that worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that a slip could turn this moment of joy into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s indifference only heightens that sense of impending misfortune.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice that the cookies are almost within reach, tempting the boy further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How easy it is to overlook the risks when you're focused on something sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
